alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued June 19 at 10:47PM PDT until June 20 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT TUESDAY... ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TUESDAY NIGHT TO 9 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the first Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 36 will result in frost formation. For the second Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 35 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County, Southwest Elko County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...For the first Frost Advisory, until 9 AM PDT Tuesday. For the second Frost Advisory, from midnight Tuesday night to 9 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
